      • getLinkLagInDays

        public static int getLinkLagInDays(TWorkItemLinkBean actualLinkBean,
                   java.lang.Double hoursPerWorkday)
        In Gantt we are handling link lags: day, week, month, This method returns link lag in days. Foe ex: -1) 1 mo link lag is 20 work day. -2) 1 w link lag is 5 work days
        Parameters:
        actualLinkBean -
        workItemID -
        Returns:
